General.Name: Banco Pan S.A
General.Description: Banco Pan S.A. operate as a multiple-service bank in Brazil. It provides loan and credit cards; vehicle financing for used cars and new motorcycles; personal credits; and overdrafts, as well as insurances. The company also offers financing for companies; construction financing for developers and builders; real estate financing and loans; acquisition of real estate receivables; and leasing services for vehicles and other assets. In addition, it provides FGTS, personal, payroll, BPC/ LOAS, and auto PAN loans; and consignment cards. The company was formerly known as Banco Panamericano S.A. and changed its name to Banco Pan S.A. in August 2014. Banco Pan S.A. is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil. Banco Pan S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Banco BTG Pactual S.A.
General.Address: Av. Paulista, 1.374, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 01310-916
